EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_DeveloperPrimerForPAS_WP_Q218.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading A Developer Primer for Pivotal Application Service: Get Ready to "cf push"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the A Developer Primer for Pivotal Application Service: Get Ready to "cf push" <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/a-developer-primer-for-pivotal-application-service]]> white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-a-developer-primer-for-pivotal-application-service-white-paper]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
